resources.string: Hm Spiro App
Settings
Welcome to the Home Spirometry study. Please enter the password to proceed.
If you do not remember the password, please contact your Enrolling Center.
Connection Failed\n\nPlease make sure that the Spirometor has sufficient battery and the batteries are properly seated.
Please enable bluetooth on the tablet to connect to the spirometer and proceed with the test

Please complete a short survey.

You will be asked whether you have any new symptoms. 

When given a single YES or NO option whether you have any of the listed symptoms, you will be presented with a YES OR NO option for each of the symptoms. Please select YES or NO for each of the symptoms.

You will be placing a pulse oximeter over either your index or middle finger for 60 seconds. The 60 seconds will begin once the device begins to record your heart rate. Please push and release the button on the pulse oximeter and press next.
Do you have any of the following?\nA NEW cough, runny nose, sore throat, fever, shaking chills, muscle aches or recent diarrhea? Please choose one below.
Do you have any of the following?\nA NEW cough, or cough now producing sputum/mucus, new wheezing or new shortness of breath? Please choose one below.
Do you have any of the following?\nA NEW generalized weakness, lightheadedness or dizziness? Please choose one below.

Do you have any of the following?\nA NEW shortness of breath at rest, on exertion or when lying flat, new shortness of breath that awakens you from sleep or new swelling in your feet or legs? Please choose one below.
Check each symptom that is NEW:

Thank you. 
 
 Please continue daily testing before 12PM. 
 
 Please Contact (314) 747-0497 for assistance if needed.
Testing and Questionnaire Complete. \n \n Your Enrolling Center will contact you for follow up instructions. Please contact your Enrolling Center if you do not hear back within 4 hours.
Please repeat all tests and questionnaire between 6am and noon for the next 4 days.
PO3
You Currently Do Not Have Any Appointment

The Pulse Oximeter was not found. Please ensure that the device has enough battery. Please press the button on the device and then the RETRY button below
